captions.text: -So, you woke up in a blood and sangria puddle
within a light bulb up your ass?
How's that even possible?
-Mad things happen during the erasmus, Mattč!
-Erasmus IS crazy! -Was even my blood...anyway
-Really absurd! But how was it, in general? What about exams?
-You can't imagine what an experience. It changed my life...exams are way easier
then the dutch girls... -See? Mattia's back! -...they've a weakness for italians!
-Matteo, listen...the rent money?
-Yes, yes but I'm talking with Mattia, I'll give them by tomorrow morning, easy!
-I used to go by bike! -Were there parks?!
-Yes they were, with bunnies!
-Matteo I need the rent money
-I told you...tomorrow, let's listen to Mattia! He came back yesterday from the Erasmus!
So, the parties?!?
-Oh, erasmus parties...with the red glasses -Erasmus parties...
...where people fall down the stairs...
-Unbelieavable! So is it all true?
-Matteo, do you remember Mimmo?
-Spade is mine, pickax's yours
-Luca, actually we... -Don't you remember Mimmo, Matteo?
-We said you wouldn't bring in this story again, Luca
-Shhhh! Do you remember our excursion at Tor Vergata fields, with Mimmo?
-Don't you?
-Luca, it is not a matter of money, I'll give them to you...
I told you I will, I'm going tomorrow morning to an ATM, ok?
-Do you want the Tor Vergata excursion being for you, this time?
*one year before*
-Shut up! Shut it! You said you wouldn't cried!
-But this thing... -You said you would not cried! That we'd have gone all the way!
All the way! Now look at me! -Ok, ok! -LOOK AT ME!
We must get rid of Mimmo
- Mimmo...
-We must not leave traces of him, do you understan? DO YOU?!
Dig now!
-God! Poor Mimmo, poor Mimmo... -Piece of shit!
-All those hairs we use to find...were his!
-What shitty shoes...
-Poor Mimmo, poor! We shouldn't, we shouldn't, Luca!
-We shouldn't? my balls we shouldn't! Poor Mimmo...
-Oh god! These things make me sick! I'm claustrophobic too!
-Come on, take him from the feet!
-No! I won't take him!
-TAKE HIM FROM THE FEET! -No Luca, I'm feeling sick...Luca
-SHHH! quiet! Be quiet!
-Look, this is all I've, for real
-Don't, just put them here -I'm really sorry! -Just put 'em here!
See? Simple as that!
Bye Mattia!
-Ciao Lů
-Welcome back!
-Pffff! That's stinky!
-Spade is mine, pickax's yours
-Ok Luca but just 10 minutes because I've to go to gym afterwards...
